item.title: Virtualbox Command Notes
item.description: My common use command 1.List VM VBoxManage list vms Using this will be more clear VBoxManage list vms | sed "s/\"\(.*\)\".*/\1/" Output: In my PC show like this: kali hadoop-master hadoop-slave2 hadoop-slave3 hadoop-slave1 2.Power On/Off VMs This is opening in GUI mode: VBoxManage startvm "<vm name>" If you want to open in backgrund: VBoxHeadless --startvm "<vm name>" --vrde=off & > tmp.txt & Power off vm VBoxManage controlvm "<vm name>" poweroff 3.
